marklogic.body:
Thank you for reposting this. Just this weekend I had that -kilter moment. I posted a comment on my G+ about being on Spring Break, indicating that I was doing a :happy dance: and someone who had me circled (now Banned) made a completely inappropriate, sexually suggestive remark. It was like Cold water splashed on my warm moment. I felt the same way as when I had my butt pinched in the park when I was 12.
When I mentioned my upset to my BF and wondered aloud whether I should report the offender or just block him, he said those horrible words, "I don't know why you're getting so upset about this." Which doesn't make me question my upset-ness, it just make me question my future ability to share those feelings with him. Which makes me far sadder than the original incident upset me.
